meanings.definition: Careful or prudent in planning for the future.
meanings.sent1: Her forehandedness approach to saving money helped her avoid financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: His forehandedness in packing for the trip ensured he had everything he needed.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's forehandedness in storing nuts for winter was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The forehandedness of the wise owl in preparing for the storm saved its nest from destruction.
meanings.sent5: The forehandedness of the farmer in planting early led to a bountiful harvest.

meanings.definition: The quality of being prepared in advance.
meanings.sent1: The forehandedness of the emergency services prevented a major disaster.
meanings.sent2: Her forehandedness in always carrying an umbrella saved her from getting wet in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The forehandedness of the student who brought extra pens to the exam was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent4: The forehandedness of the chef in prepping ingredients ahead of time made dinner service smooth.
meanings.sent5: The forehandedness of the team in planning for contingencies ensured the project's success.
